item.title: Publications
item.description: List of publications from the Fink collaboration and the larger astronomy community that uses Fink public data. 2023 Enabling discovery of solar system objects in large alert data streams, R. Le Montagner, J. Peloton, B. Carry, J. Desmars, D. Hestroffer, R. A. Mendez, A. C. Perlbarg, W. Thuillot The Tiny Time-series Transformer: Low-latency High-throughput Classification of Astronomical Transients using Deep Model Compression, Tarek Allam Jr., Julien Peloton, Jason D.
